titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ruby Breithaupt Photograph Collection 1893-1910
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Elizabeth Nielsen.

publicationstmt.publisher: Oregon State University Libraries, University Archives

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Elizabeth Nielsen. 2007
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

repository.corpname: Oregon State University Libraries, Special Collections & Archives Research Center

did.abstract: The Ruby Breithaupt Photograph Collection consists of several photographs of Oregon Agricultural College students assembled by Breithaupt, including a 1910 image of a group at Jump-off Joe on Nye Beach in Newport, Oregon.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note:
bioghist.p: Ruby Elliott, from Gresham, Oregon, attended Oregon Agricultural College in the 1908/1909 and 1909/1910 academic years. She married LeRoy Breithaupt in 1912. LeRoy Breithaupt graduated from Oregon Agricultural College in 1910 with a degree in agriculture. He was superintendent of the Harney Agricultural Experiment Station from 1912 to 1917; became the Malheur County extension agent in 1920; and was an extension specialist in agricultural economics from 1926 until his retirement in 1951.

scopecontent.p: The Ruby Breithaupt Photograph Collection consists of five photographic prints of Oregon Agricultural College students assembled by Breithaupt. Four of the prints were made in 1910; they depict picnics, a trip to Jump-off Joe at Nye Beach in Newport, Oregon, and a group of students on the steps of Cauthorn (now Fairbanks) Hall. The following individuals are identified in the photos: Ethel Allen, LeRoy Breithaupt, Leona Davis Cox, Ruby Elliott, Rhetta Huntington, McKinley Huntington, Kat O'Connor, Carl Clifton Titus, and Alfred Edmund Volck.

The collection also includes one albumen print made by John Fulton in about 1893 of a group of Oregon Agricultural College students on the steps of the Station Building (now the Women's Center Building). This group includes Fred Buchanan, Brady Burnett, Edward Getty Emmett, and Erma Laurence.

prefercite.p: Ruby Breithaupt Photograph Collection (P 042), Oregon State University Archives, Corvallis, Oregon.

acqinfo.p: The photographs were donated to the Archives by Ruby Breithaupt in 1965.

relatedmaterial.p: Other materials pertaining to LeRoy and Ruby Breithaupt are available in the Memorabilia Collection.
